subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Nick Watney shot a course-record 10-under-par 61 to hold off Robert Garrigus and the defending champion Bo Van Pelt by one shot and win the CIMB Classic in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
snippet: Nick Watney shot a course-record 10-under-par 61 to hold off Robert Garrigus and the defending champion Bo Van Pelt by one shot and win the CIMB Classic in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
